Text.Page:
Lots of animals eat what they kill, but the gulas hunt us, flay us, then serve us up!

So let's punish the kitchen help! {@LinkCreature:8#3021#Gula skinners} and {@LinkCreature:8#3022#slavering auric imps} are next on your menu, .

And bring back their knives, would you? We might be able to turn them into weapons we can use.
Knives! I like knives! Sharp, pointy knives!
When you're asleep, they're out there chopping, cooking, gnawing. When you're awake...more chopping, cooking, gnawing.
